title: Fidèle Balume
text:
Bio
I am currently a PhD candidate at University Jean-Moulin Lyon 3. I’m working on the financial distress risk of LBO companies.



Education
iaelyon school of management, University of Jean-Moulin Lyon 3, Lyon, France | PhD studies in Corporate Finance | Oct. 2020 - present
iaelyon school of management, University of Jean-Moulin Lyon 3, Lyon, France | Master in Financial Engineering and Transaction | Sept 2017 - June 2019
Visiting scholar at University of North Carolina at Charlotte, USA | March - June 2023
Summer school at Aarhus University, Denmark | July - August 2022 & at Paris School of Economics (PSE), France | June 2021



Experience
iaelyon School of Management | Researcher and Teaching Assistant | Sept. 2023 - present
Banque de France | Financial Analyst | April 2019 - Sept 2019
